meanings.definition: Capable of being converted into a coded form.
meanings.sent1: The secret message was encodable for secure communication.
meanings.sent2: The data was easily encodable into a digital format.
meanings.sent3: It was like turning a regular message into an encodable puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like encodable secrets waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The encodable information was like a hidden treasure waiting to be unlocked.

meanings.definition: Able to be represented in a format suitable for transmission or storage.
meanings.sent1: The image file was encodable for easy sharing.
meanings.sent2: The document was encodable into a PDF format.
meanings.sent3: It felt like making a secret recipe encodable for future use.
meanings.sent4: His memories were like encodable files stored in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The encodable data was like a book waiting to be read by the right program.
